Package org.dancres.blitz.jini.lockmgr

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdministratableProvider  
    Lock  
    Locker
    A non-blocking low-level lock interface.
    LockManager
    LockManager represents generic lock manager that allows obtaining and releasing locks on objects.
    MutualExclusion
    Proxy interface for the locker service.
    SharedStateListener
    Attach of this interface to VotingAdapter if you wish to delegate out passing around of shared state
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationFactory  
    Conflicter  
    DistributedLockManager
    Distributed lock manager is responsible for maintaining the lock information consistent on all participating nodes.
    DistributedLockManager.AcquireLockDecree
    This class represents the lock to be released.
    DistributedLockManager.DeleteDecree  
    DistributedLockManager.LockDecree
    This class represents the lock
    DistributedLockManager.NewDecree  
    DistributedLockManager.ReleaseLockDecree
    This class represents the lock to be released.
    DistributedLockManager.TransactionalOwner
    This class simply allows us to make the transaction part of the requester id which makes sense as the lock is owned by the transaction as much as the requester.
    JiniConfig
    Holds configuration for JINI related aspects of the Replica Group.
    LockImpl  
    LockKey  
    LockResult  
    LockStatus  
    MutexTest  
    ServerImpl  
    TwoPhaseVotingAdapter
    This adapter introduces simple two-phase voting on a specified decree.
    TwoPhaseVotingAdapter.TwoPhaseVoteWrapper  
    TwoPhaseVotingAdapter.TwoPhaseWrapper
    Wrapper of the decree to voting decree.
    TxnParticipantImpl  
    VotingAdapter
    Voting adapter provides a voting functionality for an application.
    VotingAdapter.FailureVoteResult
    Class that represents a result of local voting on the failed node.
    VotingAdapter.VoteResult
    This class represents the result of local voting.
